intro.dialog_rand1: |C3|The end of another day is near.
intro.dialog_rand2: |C3|The sun has set on yet another day.

intro.dialog_rand3: |C3|The darkness of the rain grows with the night.

intro.dialog_rand1: |C3|The time has come to choose a path.

max_warning: [VAL1] must be radiated to reach level [VAL2]

chosen.dialog: |C3|She sets off on her chosen path.
